text: František Filip (26 December 1930 – 9 January 2021) was a Czech movie and television director. Filip was born in Písek, Czechoslovakia. He was known for directing Tři chlapi v chalupě, Chalupáři and Utrpení mladého Boháčka. Filip died on 9 January 2021 at the age of 90 from COVID-19 in Prague. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Czech movie directors Category:Television directors Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Prague
title: František Filip
